tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE GenomeAnnotations (
  annotation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_name VARCHAR(255),
  chromosome VARCHAR(10),
  start_position INT,
  end_position INT,
  annotation_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE GenomeAnnotations (
 annotation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 genome_sequence TEXT,
 annotation_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Metadata (
 metadata_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 study_id UUID,
 created_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Annotations (
    annotation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_name VARCHAR(255),
    chrom_num INT,
    start_position INT,
    end_position INT,
    annotation_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Samples (
    sample_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_name VARCHAR(255),
    sample_type VARCHAR(50),
    study_id UUID,
    collection_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Studies (
    study_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    study_name VARCHAR(255),
    study_description TEXT,
    principal_investigator VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE
);
CREATE TABLE GenomeAnnotations (genome_id INT PRIMARY KEY, annotation TEXT, submission_date TIMESTAMP, contributor_name TEXT)
CREATE TABLE Metadata (metadata_id INT PRIMARY KEY, genome_id INT, data_type TEXT, data_value TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (genome_id) REFERENCES GenomeAnnotations(genome_id))
CREATE TABLE Collaborators (collaborator_id INT PRIMARY KEY, collaborator_name TEXT)
CREATE TABLE ResearchProjects (project_id INT PRIMARY KEY, project_name TEXT, project_description TEXT)

CREATE TABLE genome_annotations (
    genome_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    annotation TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE metadata (
    metadata_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    file_name VARCHAR(255),
    file_format VARCHAR(50),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE research_collaboration (
    collaboration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(100),
    research_area VARCHAR(100),
    collaboration_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE researchers (
    researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_name VARCHAR(100),
    affiliation VARCHAR(100),
    email VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE publications (
    publication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    publication_title TEXT,
    publication_year INT,
    doi VARCHAR(50)
)
